text:
Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.E. corner of Treadwell Avenue, showing St. Mary's Roman Catholic Church. The house on the left, is the parish house.

May 22, 1929

P. L. Sperr

(2)

Another view of the church, and the neighboring houses, as seen from the shore of the Kill Van Kull.

May 22, 1929

P. L. Sperr

(3)

An additional view, at a later date.

June 1, 1935

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Treadwell Avenue
